Package de.boereck.matcher.function.throwing

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ThrowingFunction<I,O,E extends Exception>
    This function is a special version of a Function, where the apply method is already implemented and calling the method applyThrowing (which may throw a checked exception of type E) and if the checked exception is thrown, re-throws the exception as if it is a RuntimeException.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ThrowingFunction.Uncheck
    Class for internal use in ThrowingFunction.
